DATA 1200 obligatorisk oppgave

Tekst fra DATA 1100 modul

Below you will find the assignment for this module, or lecture. You answer the assignment by filling in the form. The form includes 7 steps that will guide your discussions. Each step includes a short description of what you should do. It also includes a suggested timeframe for each step. You fill in the form by way of keywords or full paragraphs. Use sources, when necessary, there is a section at the end for references. Preferably use the style of APA7th. Each step is given an approximate word count, meant as a guideline, rather than absolute criteria. Below you will find the assignment for this module, or lecture.
